title: Am i really a Dick?
body: I have a friend who mains ADC and he can't handle criticism for shit. He played Draven, a champion he is not very good at to be honest, and he lost to a mirror Draven with TP, i told him off a bit cause i was not only mad but a bit confused as to how that happens and i don't think he's very interested in me apologising. He thinks i'm Toxic even tho i've never really said anything mean. He says that every champion that can kill him fast regardless fed or not is either Cancer/Broken/Unskilled. He doesn't seem to like it when we say that the champ isn't any of the above, it's his bad positioning thats the problem. He plays really passively and doesn't seem to know what to build half the time, he once went Banshees over of BT last item on Jhin even tho he had no life steal and said that it was for the CC. He doesn't understand that all champions have counterplay and think Zed/Riven(My Main)/Yasuo/Lucian and many more are easy to play and take no skill despite never actually playing them before, he refuses to look at guides or search for advice and always argue against them when he does. Need help, what could i do to help him, what should i do, was i a dick for telling him off? HELP!

replies.body: You're a dick for maining Riven! xD

imo, it doesn't seem like you were trying to help and he definitely isn't trying to improve.
and no, you're not a dick, he's not a dick you're probably just two frustrated guys
It is the right thing to do. And remember, he's the Dick! XDDDDDDDDDDD

What I do to friends like this is say that Ignorance is a choice and you are choosing it. There are things you can do to improve your game and especially being mirror against a tele Draven he should have no problems in lane unless he is either pushing hard to turret with little to no vision and getting ganked by the jg and/or he has a shitty supp. But still things can be done to make up for a bad supp. Really there is no excuse. I assume he is a bronze-silver player; have you asked him what he thinks his skill level is at tier wise?
If he would talk to me i would xD

>
> If he would talk to me i would xD

Aw stink. See ya, have a nice day, Ima go watch LoL bloopers lol xP
Depends on how you to told him off and whether you helped him much with your critique lol.

You can provide criticism or you can provide constructive criticism, the latter is much better. It depends on how you word it as to how people take it.

If you try to provide constructive criticism to help them improve and they keep disregarding it and saying this that annoy you, just ignore the fact and move on. If they don't want your feedback and knowledge to become better at the game, then that's their loss.
Best thing you can do is say nothing. Your friend sounds like a lost cause

>He says that every champion that can kill him fast regardless fed or not is either Cancer/Broken/Unskilled.

That friend, they are annoying as fuck, just ignore them as much as you can when they talk about league.
